data.comment: The match is underway in Manchester.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 6, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Goal! Andros Townsend gives Crystal Palace a 0-1 lead in Manchester.
In the minute 7, Great play from Jeffrey Schlupp to set up the goal.
Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Andros Townsend for Crystal Palace gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Important block from the Crystal Palace defence as Timothy Fosu-Mensah fires in a strike for Man Utd.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 14, Free kick Man Utd.
Man Utd needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in high up the field for Man Utd in Manchester.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Bruno Fernandes returns to the field for Man Utd after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 18, Bruno Fernandes is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Man Utd.
Man Utd pushes forward through Paul Pogba, whose finish on goal is saved.
Man Utd are coming forward and Scott McTominay gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 22, Martin Atkinson awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Andros Townsend's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 25, Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes is on target but unsuccessful.
Attention is being given to Crystal Palaceâ€™s James McCarthy and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 28, James McCarthy for Crystal Palace is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Man Utd.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 31, Crystal Palace's Jeffrey Schlupp gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Marcus Rashford is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Marcus Rashford is back on the pitch.
In the minute 34, Man Utd drive upfield and Marcus Rashford gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crystal Palace defender.
Throw-in Man Utd.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 36, Man Utd's Timothy Fosu-Mensah has run offside.
Daniel James (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 38, Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Free kick Man Utd.
In the minute 41, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In Manchester, Bruno Fernandes of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Old Trafford.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Crystal Palace.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Jordan Ayew gets his shot on target but fails to score for Crystal Palace.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Wilfried Zaha of Crystal Palace gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Mason Greenwood is on a sub for Daniel James for Man Utd.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 49, Jordan Ayew of Crystal Palace smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Man Utd drives forward and Paul Pogba gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 52, Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Timothy Fosu-Mensah.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Man Utd's Timothy Fosu-Mensah is back in action after a slight knock.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 54, Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 55, At Old Trafford, Joel Ward has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Man Utd's Anthony Martial misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In the minute 58, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Timothy Fosu-Mensah is booked for the home team.
Mason Greenwood's header is off-target for Man Utd.
In the minute 60, Martin Atkinson awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Crystal Palace drive upfield and Jeffrey Schlupp gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
In the minute 63, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Man Utd.
Harry Maguire (Man Utd) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 66, Martin Atkinson blows against Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team replace Paul Pogba with Donny van de Beek.
In the minute 68, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Man Utd's Victor Lindelof breaks free at Old Trafford. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 69, Jordan Ayew (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Man Utd's Marcus Rashford gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, An attacking Crystal Palace player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Goal! The away team extend their lead to 0-2 thanks to a penalty from Wilfried Zaha.
Roy Hodgson (Crystal Palace) is making a first substitution, with Eberechi Eze replacing Jeffrey Schlupp.
In the minute 76, Free kick Man Utd.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 78, Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Crystal Palace.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Man Utd in Manchester.
Man Utd are back in the match in Manchester. Donny van de Beek has scored to make it 1-2.
Michy Batshuayi is replacing Jordan Ayew for the away team.
In the minute 81, Odion Ighalo (Man Utd) has replaced the possibly injured Timothy Fosu-Mensah at Old Trafford.
Crystal Palace drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 84, Martin Atkinson signals a Man Utd throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
It's now 1-3 in Manchester as Wilfried Zaha scores for Crystal Palace.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In the minute 87, Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
The away team have replaced James McCarthy with Luka Milivojevic. This is the third substitution made today by Roy Hodgson.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
Michy Batshuayi of Crystal Palace gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Martin Atkinson will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Man Utd push forward at Old Trafford and Anthony Martial gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Crystal Palace defence.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Old Trafford.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
